Plot: Finally armed with dragonlances, a group of heroes, composed of a knight, barbarian, dwarf, and half-elf, faces a deadly showdown with the evil dragons and Takhisis, the Queen of Darkness.
Characters: Tanis Half-Elven, Sturm Brightblade, Flint Fireforge, Tika Waylan, Caramon Majere, Raistlin Majere, Lauralanthalasa, Kitiara uth Matar, Tasslehoff Burrfoot, Alhana Starbreeze, Riverwind, Goldmoon
